hotels.vendor_name: Royal Sonesta San Juan Puerto Rico Resort
hotels.title: Luxurious Puerto Rico Beachfront Escape with Seven Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: White sand beaches and the turquoise waters of the Atlantic Ocean are just metres away with a stay at The Royal Sonesta San Juan. Overlooking Isla Verde Beach, this modern resort is your one-stop shop for any type of holiday - foodies can indulge at the seven restaurants and bars, spa savants will slip in serenity at Zen Spa Brisas, and sun-and-sand seekers are spoilt for choice, with a lagoon-style pool sitting metres from Isla Verde's shores. Should you be able to pull yourself away, vibrant nightlife options and glamorous shopping all await nearby.
